org.apache.catalina.Wrapper

  • 使用Wrapper的程序包 
    程序包 说明
    org.apache.catalina

    org.apache.catalina.core  
    org.apache.catalina.manager  
    org.apache.catalina.manager.host  
    org.apache.catalina.realm
    This package contains Realm implementations for the various supported realm technologies for authenticating users and identifying their associated roles.
    org.apache.catalina.startup  
    org.apache.catalina.util  

    • org.apache.catalina中Wrapper的使用

      返回Wrapper的org.apache.catalina中的方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      Wrapper Context.createWrapper()
      Factory method to create and return a new Wrapper instance, of the Java implementation class appropriate for this Context implementation.
      Wrapper InstanceEvent.getWrapper()
      Return the Wrapper managing the servlet instance for which this event occurred.
      Wrapper ContainerServlet.getWrapper()
      Return the Wrapper with which this Servlet is associated.
      参数类型为Wrapper的org.apache.catalina中的方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      boolean Realm.hasRole(Wrapper wrapper, java.security.Principal principal, java.lang.String role)
      Return true if the specified Principal has the specified security role, within the context of this Realm; otherwise return false.
      void ContainerServlet.setWrapper(Wrapper wrapper)
      Set the Wrapper with which this Servlet is associated.
      参数类型为Wrapper的org.apache.catalina中的构造器 
      构造器和说明
      InstanceEvent(Wrapper wrapper, Filter filter, java.lang.String type)
      Construct a new InstanceEvent with the specified parameters.
      InstanceEvent(Wrapper wrapper, Filter filter, java.lang.String type, ServletRequest request, ServletResponse response)
      Construct a new InstanceEvent with the specified parameters.
      InstanceEvent(Wrapper wrapper, Filter filter, java.lang.String type, ServletRequest request, ServletResponse response, java.lang.Throwable exception)
      Construct a new InstanceEvent with the specified parameters.
      InstanceEvent(Wrapper wrapper, Filter filter, java.lang.String type, java.lang.Throwable exception)
      Construct a new InstanceEvent with the specified parameters.
      InstanceEvent(Wrapper wrapper, Servlet servlet, java.lang.String type)
      Construct a new InstanceEvent with the specified parameters.
      InstanceEvent(Wrapper wrapper, Servlet servlet, java.lang.String type, ServletRequest request, ServletResponse response)
      Construct a new InstanceEvent with the specified parameters.
      InstanceEvent(Wrapper wrapper, Servlet servlet, java.lang.String type, ServletRequest request, ServletResponse response, java.lang.Throwable exception)
      Construct a new InstanceEvent with the specified parameters.
      InstanceEvent(Wrapper wrapper, Servlet servlet, java.lang.String type, java.lang.Throwable exception)
      Construct a new InstanceEvent with the specified parameters.

      限定符和类型 方法和说明

    • org.apache.catalina.core中Wrapper的使用

      实现Wrapper的org.apache.catalina.core中的类 
      限定符和类型 类和说明
      class  StandardWrapper
      Standard implementation of the Wrapper interface that represents an individual servlet definition.
      返回Wrapper的org.apache.catalina.core中的方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      Wrapper StandardContext.createWrapper()
      Factory method to create and return a new Wrapper instance, of the Java implementation class appropriate for this Context implementation.
      Wrapper StandardWrapper.findMappingObject()
      已过时。 
      参数类型为Wrapper的org.apache.catalina.core中的方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      org.apache.catalina.core.ApplicationFilterChain ApplicationFilterFactory.createFilterChain(ServletRequest request, Wrapper wrapper, Servlet servlet)
      Construct and return a FilterChain implementation that will wrap the execution of the specified servlet instance.
      ServletRegistration.Dynamic StandardContext.dynamicServletAdded(Wrapper wrapper)
      hook to register that we need to scan for security annotations.

      Static version of Tomcat.addServlet(String, String, Servlet).
      static Wrapper Tomcat.addServlet(Context ctx, java.lang.String servletName, java.lang.String servletClass)
      Static version of Tomcat.addServlet(String, String, String)
      Wrapper Tomcat.addServlet(java.lang.String contextPath, java.lang.String servletName, Servlet servlet)
      Add an existing Servlet to the context with no class.forName or initialisation.
      Wrapper Tomcat.addServlet(java.lang.String contextPath, java.lang.String servletName, java.lang.String servletClass)
      Equivalent with .
